mapper.select: SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/10.0) FROM review WHERE no=#{no} AND type=#{type}

SELECT no,reviewno,title,memberid,content,regdate,expdate,likecount,grade,num FROM (SELECT no,reviewno,title,memberid,content,regdate,expdate,likecount,grade,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,reviewno,title,memberid,content,regdate,expdate,likecount,grade FROM review WHERE no=#{no} AND type=#{type} ORDER BY no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT distinct(filepath) FROM tourplace, (select photo.filepath as filepath, review.no FROM photo, review WHERE photo.no=review.no) WHERE tourplace.no=#{no} AND rownum=1;
SELECT review.reviewno as reviewno, photo.filepath as filepath FROM review,photo WHERE photo.no=review.no

SELECT tname, no, distance, num FROM (SELECT tname, no, distance, rownum as num FROM (SELECT tname, no, distance_wgs84(#{mapx},#{mapy},mapx,mapy) as distance from tourplace ORDER by distance ASC )) WHERE num BETWEEN 2 AND 5

SELECT rname, no, distance, num FROM (SELECT rname, no, distance, rownum as num FROM (SELECT rname, no, distance_wgs84(#{mapx},#{mapy},mapx,mapy) as distance from restaurant ORDER by distance ASC )) WHERE num BETWEEN 2 AND 5

SELECT fname, no, distance, num FROM (SELECT fname, no, distance, rownum as num FROM (SELECT fname, no, distance_wgs84(#{mapx},#{mapy},mapx,mapy) as distance from festival ORDER by distance ASC )) WHERE num BETWEEN 2 AND 5

SELECT no,reviewno,title,memberid,content,regdate,expdate,likecount,grade,num FROM (SELECT no,reviewno,title,memberid,content,regdate,expdate,likecount,grade,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,reviewno,title,memberid,content,regdate,expdate,likecount,grade FROM review WHERE no=#{no} AND type=#{type} ORDER BY regdate DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN 1 AND 2;
